forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the sun peeks through a tranquil veil, casting a gentle light upon the city as the day begins. The forecast hints at a pleasant shift from morning brightness to a slightly cooler afternoon, a reminder of the city’s ever-changing moods. A light breeze whispers through the streets, stirring the leaves and adding a crispness to the air—ideal for a stroll along the waterfront or a visit to one of the many charming cafés nestled among the bustling neighborhoods. 

As the sun bows toward the west, a slight chill will settle, inviting you to wrap yourself in a cozy layer. A light jacket should suffice for the evening, perfect for those who plan to savor the outdoors a bit longer. While fog may linger in some corners, it dances around the Golden Gate, leaving the more vibrant parts of our fair city largely unobscured—a perfect backdrop for an evening walk or gathering with friends. Embrace this gentle day, for it’s a fine opportunity to both explore and unwind.
